attributes.action: Give Key Workers in England with continuous service a 12 month PAYE Tax break.
attributes.additional_details: Key Workers in England have spent 12 months dealing with harrowing and mentally exhausting times during the Covid-19 Lockdowns. They have continually put themselves and their families at risk in order to deliver vital services to the Country during a period of extreme stress and I believe they should be rewarded for the sacrifices they have made and the Mental Exhaustion they have had to endure.
attributes.background: Provide all Key Workers in England who have a record of continuous service throughout the Covid National Lockdown a FULL PAYE Tax Break for a 12 month period as a thank you for the risks they have taken helping the country to continue to function by delivering vital services.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Refund PAYE tax for year 2020/21 to Keyworker and Essential Worker Roles: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/568374

Suspend PAYE Tax for all frontline Key workers for 6 months: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/556818

Give all key workers a tax break for 2021: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/568861

Give essential and key workers a tax break/refund: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/567150
